title: Sooo riot. Maybe you should listen.
body:
I joined a ranked game today. played 10 min of it, when suddenly my client froze. I had to restart my computer since i could (ctrl + Alt + Esc) out and close the game. So after restarting my pc, which is really fast and has a i7 processor. I opened the game and the client crashed two times. Then when i finally joined they game i was kicked due to being afk. so i had to rejoin the game for a 4th time. Then i joined, and my team won the game. i was only in the game for like 2 min before that happened.

(btw we won cus i gave our mid and top kills, i was the jungler) 
And now i have a 20 min wait for 5 games, bcus i was afk, bcus of riots shitty  terms....
if anything riot could at least remove the ban, since we won the game, and there wasn't any failure on my behalf

replies.body:
Regardless of intention, a disconnection negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a reason why all disconnections are treated as equals and why penalties cannot be modified or removed.

Additionally, you'll never receive a 5-game penalty for a single match. It takes a trend of disconnections before you see such a penalty. In this instance, it sounds like the Windows Game Bar may have been the cause of your issue, so I recommend [disabling this feature entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if you have any more issues crashing after turning off that feature.
